name: Smite Wars
description:
Goal of the game: Kill all of the enemy's villagers before they kill yours! Kill them by guessing the correct hiding spots and smiting them!

How to play:

1) Hide your peeps: click on forrest tiles to hide a villager there. Hide all 10 villagers to continue.

2) Blackjack : play blackjack vs the cpu. Winner gets to smite a tile! (in case of a draw, cpu wins)

3) Smite!: If you win the blackjack round, you get to smite a forrest tile!

This game is a submission for the 8 bits to infinity ~ Mashup Jam.

Goal of the jam is to combine 2 game-types (picked from a list). For this game I picked Blackjack and Battleship.
